text: Sihamtaka hidayata pradanara dayitba tomara nahaya; baram allahe yaka iccha hidayata diye; arau yi dhana-sampada tomaloke byaya karaa seya kerala tomalokara nijara babe arau tomaloke kerala allahara babe'i (te'omra santusti arjanara babe'i) byaya karaa; arau tomaloke uttama kono bastu byaya karaile tara puraskara tomalokaka paraipurnabharae pradana karaa haba arau tomalokara prati an'yaya karaa nahaâ€™ba
